posts.postText:
Offender name?: Luigi
Which Server?: TTT
Offender's Steam ID?: This can be found by typing "status" in console. Should look something like STEAM_0:1:25397734
What the Offender did?: Was butt hurt after I killed him so he repeatedly kicks me, or anyone with the name slap in their name... ex Lightning changed name to slapsilly and he kicked him.
Proof?: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NaJJpCcz6RI

I cant even join the server because hes soo butt hurt...
your banned i can kick you ^^ . you need proof . you hav aimbot so i banned you <3

I want you to prove that I have an aimbot! 

I want proof of that, you sore loser.. I head shot u with a scout so u think I hack? Get real
I'm banning your forum account for Admin Disrespect (Or moderator) right here on our forums.

Bird, I see no reason in banning him. Maybe he doesn't have an aimbot? Either that or he's a persistent guy.
Luigi is only kicking you because you're trying to rejoin when the autokick kicks you off the server after 10 seconds.

>> Bird, I see no reason in banning him. Maybe he doesn't have an aimbot? Either that or he's a persistent guy.
Luigi is only kicking you because you're trying to rejoin when the autokick kicks you off the server after 10 seconds. 
He called Luigi a butthurt loser in his first post. Perhaps a permanent ban on the forums wasn't suiting though...

Truth hurts.. but listen.. I barely started on your server.... why would I care if I got banned for hacks....and second.... WHY WOULD I RISK A VAC BAN, in outta all of valve games, garrys mod.... call me crazy..... I head shot him with a scout and in return I get banned... I think a timeout is in order... along with me getting unbanned

From what I heard, you had 2 things.

1. Aimbot
2. Some kind of hack that shows you who traitors are.

I don't know exactly what happened because I was in a different area, but when i recieved messages from Luigi, there were 2 traitors dead only. All innocents were alive. So #2 might have been a possibility, but i'm unsure because I didn't check the end round scores.

Thats all I gotta say to support / not support.

Note to players/staff:
Please Do Not Reply unless you are DIRECTLY INVOLVED in the situation, or are gash, bird or I.
We don't need your comments.
:/

I've never even heard of that stuff.... I don;t even think Garry himself could hack and find out who the traitors were... they both tried to kill me at the same time and I headshot them.... one of them was luigi.... who retaliated to his failed plan by kicking me...... Sounds pretty abusive....
Flame was on when this was happening though... he was just laughing at me/the situation the whole time....
